name: B3-Leads
body:
### 
This is where you describe your goals, and what exactly it is you are trying to accomplish with this current code commit. Well I am seeking to change the way that things work in the affiliate world, because I am so tired of this good ole' boy network shit.
```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```

### Subscriber Control
I will include a templating system to work with existing templates i have that are responsive.

### Landing Page Template Controls
I will include a templating system to work with existing templates i have that are responsive.

### Contact Information
I have my own information I will include at a later time.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
